name: tts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool text_to_speech_api.
Tool description: This API takes text and languages code and return speech voice
API description: Converts given text to speech in the specified language and returns the result in .mp3 format using the RapidAPI service.

text.description: The text to be converted to speech.

lang.description: Language code for the speech conversion. Defaults to 'en'.
